tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE NetworkTrafficMonitoring (
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  source_ip VARCHAR,
  destination_ip VARCHAR,
  traffic_type VARCHAR,
  traffic_speed FLOAT,
  quality_of_service VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE NetworkTrafficMonitoring (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    traffic_amount INT
);

CREATE TABLE QualityOfService (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    service_type VARCHAR(255),
    response_time INT,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE NetworkTrafficMonitoring (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    traffic_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    data_sent DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE QualityOfService (
    qos_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    throughput DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    latency DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    traffic_priority VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Network_Traffic_Monitoring (
   id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP,
   source_ip TEXT,
   destination_ip TEXT,
   data_usage INT
);

CREATE TABLE QoS_Management (
   id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP,
   source_ip TEXT,
   destination_ip TEXT,
   service_type TEXT,
   latency FLOAT
);
